page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN MARSHFIELD
page.content: There is easy access from Marshfield to all nearby towns, so many people work out of the village. A large number are teachers. Within the area the largest employer is the International School of Choueifat with 104 staff, 25 from Marshfield. Dowty Electronics employs 60 (only 4 from Marshfield). The following each employ between 1 and 18, mostly from other areas - Printer, Agricultural Machinery, Oriental Carpet Restorer, 2 Coach/Holiday Companies, 2 Garages / Hauliers, 3 Inns, Builder, Baker, Refrigerator Sales, Hairdresser, 2 Banks, Estate Agent, Post Office and 5 shops. Working alone or with family - Photographer, Caner, Picture Framer, Caterer, Electrician, Motorcycle Repairer, TV Repairer, Farmers and Builders. Some women work as cleaners. Few people are out of work.
